DOC.brief_summary: The investigator plan develop process create Enhanced Medication List . The INPC ( Indiana Network Patient Care ) already obtain history medication dispense pharmacy several source : pharmacy benefit manager , RxHub , insurance company , Medicaid , SureScripts , Wishard Health Services . The investigator collect medication data available INPC individual patient . The investigator enhance medication list include medication category , improve structure appearance , display result relevant laboratory test , add decision support reminder . The investigator test value `` Enhanced Medication List '' provide outpatient physician practice ( DOCS4DOCS clinical messaging service , fax ) , preferably day patient office visit physician . The investigator determine whether intervention improve patient care : whether high rate recommend laboratory follow-up monitoring result ; whether low rate harmful drug-drug interaction . The investigator also seek opinion physician regard benefit intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Improving Laboratory Follow-up Delivering Enhanced Medication List Outpatient Physician Practices
